record.title: DESIGNATING THE C. CLYDE ATKINS U.S. COURTHOUSE
record.narrative:
DESIGNATING THE C. CLYDE ATKINS U.S. COURTHOUSE -- (Senate - December 13, 2007)

[Page: S15568]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that the Environment and Public Works Committee be discharged from further consideration of H.R. 2671 and that the Senate then proceed to its immediate consideration.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered. The clerk will state the bill by title.
record.narrative: The legislative clerk read as follows:
A bill (H.R. 2671) to designate the United States Court House located at 301 North Miami Avenue, Miami, Florida, as the "C. Clyde Atkins U.S. Courthouse."
There being no objection, the Senate proceeded to consider the bill.

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that the bill be read the third time and passed, the motion to reconsider be laid upon the table, and that any statements relating thereto be printed in the Record, without intervening action or debate.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.
The bill (H.R. 2671) was ordered to a third reading, was read the third time, and passed.
